name: chrome-power
description: The first open source multi-chrome manager tool.

scripts.build:native-addon: cd ./packages/main/src/native-addon && node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build
scripts.build:native-addon:mac-x64: cd ./packages/main/src/native-addon && node-gyp clean && SDKROOT=$(xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path) CFLAGS="-arch x86_64" CXXFLAGS="-arch x86_64" LDFLAGS="-arch x86_64" npm_config_arch=x64 node-gyp configure && SDKROOT=$(xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path) CFLAGS="-arch x86_64" CXXFLAGS="-arch x86_64" LDFLAGS="-arch x86_64" npm_config_arch=x64 node-gyp build
scripts.build:native-addon:mac-arm64: cd ./packages/main/src/native-addon && node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build --arch=arm64
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --dir --config.asar=false
scripts.package: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.js --publish never
scripts.test: cross-env MODE=production npm run test:main && npm run test:preload && npm run test:renderer && npm run test:e2e
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:main && npm run typecheck:preload
scripts.postinstall: cross-env ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE=1 electron scripts/update-electron-vendors.mjs && (node scripts/build-native-addon.js || echo 'Warning: Native addon build skipped')
scripts.rebuild-deps: npm rebuild sqlite3 --build-from-source --arch=x64 && npm rebuild sqlite3 --build-from-source --arch=arm64
scripts.rebuild-deps:mac: npm rebuild sqlite3 --build-from-source --arch=x64 && npm rebuild sqlite3 --build-from-source --arch=arm64
